gldemo

Class GLApp_DemoLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • glapp.GLApp
      • gldemo.GLApp_DemoLight

  • public class GLApp_DemoLight
extends GLApp
    Use setMaterial(), setLight() and makeTexture() to control light and material properties.

    napier at potatoland dot org
